resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No Database Administrators allocated despite requirement to migrate 28 databases (18 SQL Server, 6 Oracle, 4 MySQL)
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: High risk of data loss, extended downtime, and migration failures for all database systems, affecting critical business operations
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Project Requirements 2.2: Database Migration specifies 28 databases to be migrated; Resource Allocation Matrix shows no DBAs

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No DevOps Engineers allocated despite requirements for CI/CD implementation and automation
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Inability to implement automated deployment pipelines, resulting in manual processes, higher error rates, and longer deployment times
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Project Requirements 3.1: Monitoring and Management mentions automated remediation; no DevOps resources in allocation matrix

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: Training Specialist not allocated until task #23, but training needs exist throughout project
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: IT operations team will be unprepared to manage cloud environment, risking operational failures post-migration
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Project Charter Success Criteria #4: IT operations team fully trained; Stakeholder Expectations 3.1 mentions comprehensive training

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No Change Management Specialist allocated despite significant organizational change
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: User resistance, poor adoption of new systems, and business disruption due to inadequate change management
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Stakeholder Expectations document sections 2.1-2.4 show business units expecting minimal disruption and clear communication

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No database migration tools allocated despite need to migrate 28 databases of different types
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Manual database migration will increase project duration, risk of errors, and potential data loss
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Project Requirements 2.2: Database Migration requires migrating 28 databases with minimal downtime; no tools allocated in resource matrix

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No monitoring tools allocated despite operational requirements for comprehensive monitoring
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Inability to monitor cloud environment performance, security, and compliance, risking undetected issues and SLA violations
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Project Requirements 3.1: Monitoring and Management requires comprehensive monitoring; no monitoring tools in resource allocation

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No testing environment allocated for validating migrations before production deployment
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Increased risk of production issues, downtime, and business disruption due to untested migrations
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Project Requirements 2.3: Application Testing requires test plans and testing; no testing environment in resource allocation

resource_gap_analysis.gap_description: No training materials allocated despite requirements for knowledge transfer and training
resource_gap_analysis.impact_if_not_addressed: Ineffective training delivery, knowledge gaps in operations team, and potential operational issues post-migration
resource_gap_analysis.supporting_evidence: Project Requirements 3.3: Documentation and Training requires training for IT staff; no training materials allocated

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Database Administrator with SQL Server migration experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Required to migrate 18 SQL Server databases as specified in Project Requirements 2.2. Needed before Migration Wave 1 begins in June 2024.
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Utilize existing staff with additional training instead of new hires

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Database Administrator with Oracle migration experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Required to migrate 6 Oracle databases as specified in Project Requirements 2.2. Needed before Migration Wave 1 begins in June 2024.
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Engage external consultants instead of hiring full-time staff

resource_recommendations.resource_description: DevOps Engineer with CI/CD pipeline experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Required to implement automation for deployment, testing, and remediation as specified in Project Requirements 3.1.
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Implement automated solutions instead of manual processes

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Training Specialist with technical training experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Required to develop and deliver training throughout project, not just at end, per Stakeholder Expectations 3.1.
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use virtual training instead of in-person sessions

resource_recommendations.resource_description: Change Management Specialist with IT transformation experience
resource_recommendations.justification: Required to manage organizational change aspects of migration to ensure user adoption and minimize disruption.
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Leverage existing staff with additional training instead of new hires

resource_recommendations.justification: Required to automate and streamline migration of 28 databases as specified in Project Requirements 2.2.
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use open-source tools instead of commercial software

resource_recommendations.justification: Required to implement comprehensive monitoring per Project Requirements 3.1 and meet stakeholder expectations for reliability.
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use open-source tools instead of commercial software

resource_recommendations.justification: Required to provide hands-on training for IT operations team as specified in Project Requirements 3.3.
resource_recommendations.alternatives_considered: Use cloud provider professional services instead of third-party consultants

budget_impact_summary.cost_saving_measures: Implement reserved instances for predictable workloads
